page.title: 12THE PLAYING FIELDS(CONT)
page.content: At the beginning the Bridge Field was just that, just a field and it was used by the farmer to keep his cows in.There was a small football field used by the{Grindleford juniors}but apart from that it was just a{meadow. They organised the committee by holding a public meeting in the chapel school room and all the village were asked to attend.A lot of people turned up for that firsted meeting in 1976 and mr robert crossland was elected{chairman}and then we had to decide who was going to be on the committee this was very difficult because there were so many people interested in developing a playing field for Grindleford eventully,we decided that we were going to have a committee of 12 and these were alected from all those present.
